content.content: 1. The following local boards are exempted from the definition of “local board” in subsection 1 (1) of the Act: 1. A society as defined in subsection 2 (1) of the Child, Youth and Family Services Act, 2017. 2. A board of health as defined in subsection 1 (1) of the Health Protection and Promotion Act. 3. A committee of management established under the Fixing Long-Term Care Act, 2021. 4. A police services board established under the Police Services Act. 5. A board as defined in section 1 of the Public Libraries Act. O. Reg. 114/15, s. 1; O. Reg. 179/18, s. 1; O. Reg. 264/22, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following local boards are exempted from the definition of “local board” in subsection 1 (1) of the Act:

1. A society as defined in subsection 2 (1) of the Child, Youth and Family Services Act, 2017.

2. A board of health as defined in subsection 1 (1) of the Health Protection and Promotion Act.

3. A committee of management established under the Fixing Long-Term Care Act, 2021.

4. A police services board established under the Police Services Act.

5. A board as defined in section 1 of the Public Libraries Act. O. Reg. 114/15, s. 1; O. Reg. 179/18, s. 1; O. Reg. 264/22, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
